Name: Created
Description: The bin has been created, and assigned barcode, name, and label.

Name: Sealed
Description: The bin is full, and has been closed with a zip tie.  No more items may be added or removed from the bin.

Name: Batched
Description: The bin has been assigned to a batch.

Name: Returned to Staging Area
Description: The bin has been returned to the staging area for unpacking.

Name: Unpacked
Description: The bin has been emptied of all physical objects and the physical objects were either all returned or declared not returned.
